fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: During the day, select a player to challenge to a TETR.IO set. This will roleblock them at night. If you win, you will kill them. If you lose, you must have had 3 score or more, or you will die.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You must use an alternative account to hide your identity. You must play in a private custom game. All rules of the set must remain as default, except for the First To (FT) setting. It must be set to 7. You will wipe the wills of people you kill.
